text: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ فَأَصَمَّهُمْ وَأَعْمَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرَهُمْ

translation.en.sahih: Those [who do so] are the ones that Allah has cursed, so He deafened them and blinded their vision.
translation.id.indonesian: Mereka itulah orang-orang yang dilaknati Allah dan ditulikan-Nya telinga mereka dan dibutakan-Nya penglihatan mereka.
